Accueil.banner1: Let you carried away by your senses to discover the intimacy to wines and alcohols suggested for this experience.
Accueil.banner2: Hypnosis offers you a new sensory perspective through wine tasting and allows you to see the wine on a different angle and accept this journey invitation.
Accueil.banner3: Firstly, an immersion in oenology domain, with degustation basis, is needed for standardized everyone knowledge’s.
Accueil.banner4: Then, you will be guided in the self-hypnosis experiment and learning in aim of let you enter in a relaxation state and an awareness condition that enhances this extraordinary degustation.
Accueil.banner5: After vineyard to wine-making process introduction, you will travel though the wine defining feature, delight and softness.

Wines.h2: Find the wines tasted during our events !

About.content1: Hypnotherapist and wine passionate, my great grandfather founded a family wine estate in Suzette.
About.content2: My two passions for wine and hypnosis are therefore combined to provide everyone with an unforgettable tasting experience.
